attributes.action: Unjust overcharging of motorcycle road tax
attributes.additional_details:
Can anyone explain why we as motorcyclists who are kinder to the environment not only in CO2 emissions but wear and tear on infrastructure are obviously discriminated against and overcharged for excise licence
these are my 2 vehicles
Motorcycle
2014 Honda NC 750s DCT                  80.3 CO2 g/km. (CO2 - Carbon dioxide emission)  £80.00 p/a

Car
2010 Ford Focus Titanium 1.6 diesel     109  CO2 g/km. (CO2 - Carbon dioxide emission)   £30.00 p/a

This is positive discrimination,  All 2 wheeled transport should be £0 Rated
